title: Braless Bella Thorne flashes nipple piercing on Snapchat
title_page: Braless Bella Thorne flashes nipple piercing on Snapchat | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's no stranger to sharing revealing snaps on social media.
And Bella Thorne was up to her usual tricks on Wednesday as she shares a series of Snapchat videos, showing off her nipple piercing in a skin-tight top.
The 19-year-old Disney starlet snapped a sexy mirror selfie, going braless in her flesh-coloured top.
